clinical_study.brief_title: Dexmedetomidine Influence on the Level of Perioperative Blood Glucose and Insulin of Elderly Diabetes Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: Dexmedetomidine is a kind of high selectivity alpha 2 agonists adrenaline, can inhibit the activity of sympathetic nerve, alleviate pain,and improve cardiovascular stability in the operation period. Dexmedetomidine have influence on perioperative stress response and immune function,but it is not clear.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the day before surgery to 24 hours after surgery
primary_outcome.description: measure blood glucose at 3 time points,the day before surgery,Intraoperative(1 hour after surgery begain),one day after surgery(24 hours after surgery); examine the concentration of blood glucose in serum.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the day before surgery to 24 hours after surgery
primary_outcome.description: measure the level of blood insulin at 3 time points,the day before surgery,Intraoperative(1 hour after surgery begain),one day after surgery(24 hours after surgery); use ELISA to examine the concentration of blood insulin in serum.

secondary_outcome.description: measure the blood pressure(BP),heart rate(HR) and oxygen saturation(SpO2) in the perioperative period

arm_group.description: for normal patients: inhale Isoflurane + the same volume of saline during operation
for normal patients: inhale Isoflurane + intravenous pumping Dexmedetomidine during operation
for diabetes patients: inhale Isoflurane + the same volume of saline during operation
for diabetes patients: inhale Isoflurane + intravenous pumping Dexmedetomidine during operation

intervention.description: general anesthesia induction: midazolam 0.1mg/Kg, sufentanil 1ug/Kg, cisatracurium 0.15mg/Kg, and then immediatly administrate etomidate 0.2 mg/Kg
anesthesia induction period: intravenous pumping Dexmedetomidine 4ug/Kg/h; after 10 minutes,turn to 0.4ug/Kg/h.
the same volume of saline + Isoflurane during operation

clinical_study.keyword: Dexmedetomidine perioperative blood glucose and insulin
